committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Disaster Recovery Reform Act of 2018 to require the President to automatically waive certain critical document fees for individuals and households affected by major disasters for which assistance is provided under the Individuals and Households Program.

summary.text:
Replacing Essential Passports and Licenses After Certain Emergencies Act or the REPLACE Act

This bill requires the President to automatically waive fees to replace critical documents for individuals and households affected by major disasters for which assistance is provided under the Individuals and Households Program.
